snippet: Senator Bob Corker announced Monday that he was putting a hold on the aid until the until the Obama administration explains the rationale behind these bags of cash being delivered to President Hamid Karzai.
abstract: Senator Bob Corker of Tennessee, ranking Republican on Foreign Relations Committee, announces that he is putting hold on aid to Afghan government until White House proves that bags of cash being delivered to Pres Hamid Karzai by the Central Intelligence Agency are not fueling the corruption that pervades his administration.
lead_paragraph: Senator Bob Corker announced Monday that he was putting a hold on the aid until the until the Obama administration explains the rationale behind these bags of cash being delivered to President Hamid Karzai.

headline.main: Top Senator on Panel Blocks Aid to Afghans
headline.print_headline: Top Senator On Panel Blocks Aid To Afghans
